text: Dr. Mohammed Abdullah Al-Abduljader is a former member of parliament in the Kuwaiti National Assembly representing the second district. Al-Abduljader was the deputy secretary general of the Kuwait Democratic Foundation; a progressive, liberal Kuwaiti political organization that is a strong advocate of civil liberties, and of political and economic reform. Born in 1964, Al- Abduljader studied geopolitics and worked in the Ministry of Finance before being elected to the National Assembly in 2008. In 2008, Al-Abduljader ran for office under the banner of the liberal National Democratic Alliance;Arab Times MP Profile an umbrella coalition of different liberal political figures and groups, including the Kuwait Democratic Forum. He won in 10th place. title: Mohammed Al-Abduljader
